languages.text: "Имеют. Кроме того, едва ли Вольный Торговец Винтерскейл будет против, что арбитры помогут разгрести творящийся тут бардак. Что касается губернатора — Помазаннику Императора будет нелишне узнать, насколько добросовестно его слуга выполняет обязанности".

"We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."
languages.original_text: "Имеют. Кроме того, едва ли Вольный Торговец Винтерскейл будет против, что арбитры помогут разгрести творящийся тут бардак. Что касается губернатора — Помазаннику Императора будет нелишне узнать, насколько добросовестно его слуга выполняет обязанности".

traits.locale_text: "We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning about how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

"We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning about how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

"We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

languages.text: "Die haben wir in der Tat. Außerdem bezweifle ich, dass Freihändler Winterzunder die Hilfe der Arbitratoren bei der Beendigung dieses Wahnsinns als misslich empfinden wird. Was den Gouverneur angeht, könnte ich mir vorstellen, dass der Gesalbte des Imperators vom Wissen, wie eifrig sein Diener seine Pflichten erfüllt hat, durchaus profitieren wird."
languages.original_text: "We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

traits.locale_text: "Die haben wir in der Tat. Außerdem bezweifle ich, dass Freihändler Winterzunder die Hilfe der Arbitratoren bei der Beendigung dieses Wahnsinns als misslich empfinden wird. Was den Gouverneur angeht, könnte ich mir vorstellen, dass der Gesalbte des Imperators vom Wissen, wie eifrig sein Diener seine Pflichten erfüllt hat, durchaus profitieren wird."

languages.text: « Nous l'avons. Et je doute que le libre-marchand Wintescale s'offusque de l'intervention des arbitrators pour faire cesser cette folie. Quant au gouverneur, j'imagine que {mf|le porteur|la porteuse} de l'onction impériale sera fort aise de savoir combien son serviteur s'est appliqué dans ses devoirs. »
languages.original_text: "We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

traits.locale_text: « Nous l'avons. Et je doute que le libre-marchand Wintescale s'offusque de l'intervention des arbitrators pour faire cesser cette folie. Quant au gouverneur, j'imagine que {mf|le porteur|la porteuse} de l'onction impériale sera fort aise de savoir combien son serviteur s'est appliqué dans ses devoirs. »

languages.text: «Así es. Además, dudo que el Comerciante Independiente Winterscale se disguste si los Arbitrator ayudan a arreglar este desaguisado. En cuanto al gobernador, imagino que el ungido del Emperador quedará satisfecho al conocer la diligencia mostrada por su siervo en el desempeño de su deber».
languages.original_text: "We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

traits.locale_text: «Así es. Además, dudo que el Comerciante Independiente Winterscale se disguste si los Arbitrator ayudan a arreglar este desaguisado. En cuanto al gobernador, imagino que el ungido del Emperador quedará satisfecho al conocer la diligencia mostrada por su siervo en el desempeño de su deber».

languages.text: “我们有这个权力。不仅如此，法务官协助行商浪人清理烂摊子，恐怕温特斯凯尔本人也不会有任何异议。至于这位总督，我们会与温特斯凯尔见面，告知他的仆人是如何勤勉地履行他的职责，相信帝皇的那位神选者也会从我们的报告中受益。”
languages.original_text: "We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

traits.locale_text: “我们有这个权力。不仅如此，法务官协助行商浪人清理烂摊子，恐怕温特斯凯尔本人也不会有任何异议。至于这位总督，我们会与温特斯凯尔见面，告知他的仆人是如何勤勉地履行他的职责，相信帝皇的那位神选者也会从我们的报告中受益。”

languages.text: 「あります。それに、この混乱を鎮めるのにアービトレイターが一役買ったことを、ローグトレーダーのウィンタースケールが嫌がる理由などあるでしょうか？総督については、自らの忠実なしもべがどれだけ熱心に職務を果たしているかを皇帝陛下の御加護を受けた者が知ることになるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

traits.locale_text: 「あります。それに、この混乱を鎮めるのにアービトレイターが一役買ったことを、ローグトレーダーのウィンタースケールが嫌がる理由などあるでしょうか？総督については、自らの忠実なしもべがどれだけ熱心に職務を果たしているかを皇帝陛下の御加護を受けた者が知ることになるでしょう」

languages.text: "Sahiptir. Ayrıca Hür Tacir Winterscale, Yargıcıların bu zırvalığın ortadan kaldırılmasına yardım etmesini muhtemelen hoş karşılayacaktır. İmparator'un mesh ettiği kişi, hizmetkârlarının görevlerini ne büyük özenle yerine getirdiğini görmekten mutluluk duyacaktır."
languages.original_text: "We do. Besides, I doubt Rogue Trader Winterscale will find it disagreeable that the Arbitrators have helped to clean up this madness. As for the governor, I imagine the Emperor's anointed will benefit from learning how diligently his servant has been performing his duties."

traits.locale_text: "Sahiptir. Ayrıca Hür Tacir Winterscale, Yargıcıların bu zırvalığın ortadan kaldırılmasına yardım etmesini muhtemelen hoş karşılayacaktır. İmparator'un mesh ettiği kişi, hizmetkârlarının görevlerini ne büyük özenle yerine getirdiğini görmekten mutluluk duyacaktır."
